11100011101000000100111111111010		mov r4, #1000							
11100011101000000101000001100100		mov r5, #100
11100011101000000110000000001010		mov r6, #10
11100011101000000001000000000000		mov r1, #0     --init
11100011101000000010000000000000		mov r2, #0		--init
11100011101000000011000000000000		mov r3, #0		--init
		ldr r0, [inp]
first:	11100001010100000000000000000100     cmp r0, r4
		blt second
		11100000010000000000000000000100     sub r0, r0, r4
		11100010100000110011000000000001	add r3, r3, #1
		b first
second: 11100001010100000000000000000101	cmp r0, r5
		blt third
		11100000010000000000000000000101	sub r0, r0, r5
		11100010100000100010000000000001	add r2, r2, #1
		b second
third:  11100001010100000000000000000110	cmp r0, r6
		blt fourth
		11100000010000000000000000000110	sub r0, r0, r6
		11100010100000010001000000000001	add r1, r1, #1
		b third
fourth: 11100001100000000000001000000001	orr r0, r0, r1, lsl #4
		11100001100000000000010000000010	orr r0, r0, r2 lsl #8
		11100001100000000000011000000011	orr r0, r0, r3 lsl #12
		str r0, [outp]
